<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load intrinsic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinesdnode">MachineSDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a6df0bebd8a9245a944f0682ac1231a1b">LoadInstrForLoadIntrinsic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;IntN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given the circ/brev load intrinsic and the already generated machine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, generate the appropriate store (that is a part of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intrinsic&#39;s functionality).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#ab58a68a9178bb332e0c3f5c19fd381ec">StoreInstrForLoadIntrinsic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinesdnode">MachineSDNode</a> &#42;LoadN, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;IntN);</span></CodeLine>
